entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:21 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
